thread.title: Cubs win NL Division Series, beat Cardinals 6-4 in Game 4
thread.title_full: Cubs win NL Division Series, beat Cardinals 6-4 in Game 4

title: Cubs win NL Division Series, beat Cardinals 6-4 in Game 4
text:
> Top News Cubs win NL Division Series, beat Cardinals 6-4 in Game 4 Chicago Cubs catcher Miguel Montero (47) and relief pitcher Hector Rondon (56) celebrate after winning Game 4 in baseball's National League Division Series, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Chicago. The Cubs won 6-4. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
